name: MED MAYHEM
description:
You are a bedbounded  orange guy. You move around by shooting your pistols, but don't get too far from your life support  or else  the connection will break and you'll die. You will have to protect your life support from doctors that try to move it. Your goal is to escape the hospital.

NOTE: There are quite a lot  of bugs, and the game is really short due to the time limit. But it was a lot of fun developing this game. Hope you enjoy!
